attributes.action: change the rules on who is eligible to become an MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All politicians should have at least 10years work experience prior to becoming eligible to become a MP. 

How can a career politician on inflated salaries, excessive benefits and pension packages, with no experience of the job market, housing, the health service, schooling and so on have any real knowledge and be able speak with any conviction on voters behalf when in reality they have no experience of the real world we voters live in. 

The only barrier this will cause is a younger age limit starting at 25-26. The House will then have MP's with real knowledge rather than political ideals with no substance behind this.

The sooner this starts the better the country will be.....

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
